channel.title: tyecon on TerseTears's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in tyecon on TerseTears's Blog

item.title: Journey Through `tyecon`: Exploring Food.com Tags
item.description: Introduction I’ve been working on my R package, tyecon for some time now. I think it can be a useful tool in performing day to day data analysis tasks. The idea is very simple: More higher order macros. There’s no reason to focus on the handful of existing ones, like the magrittr pipes or the dplyr syntax. We have a language here that supports lazy evaluation and first class functions. This is all we need to make programming life easier.
